text: The following list is a programming originally broadcast on Epic TV, a television channel in India. ==Fiction== *Danav Hunters *Dharmakshetra *The Great Escape *Lootere - The Bandits Of India *Rakt *Siyaasat *Stories By Rabindranath Tagore *Time Machine *Yam Kisi She Kam Nahin ==Drama== * Adrishya * Dariba Diaries * Ekaant * Kahi Suni * Lost Recipes * Med In India * Raja Rasoi Anya Kahaniyaan * Sanrachna * Umeed India ==References== Category:Lists of television series
title: List of programs broadcast by Epic TV
